name: Từ vựng Tiếng Anh các hoạt động khác (Other Activities)

words.example: I need to clean the house before my guests arrive.
My mother loves to cook delicious meals.
It's important to do housework regularly to keep your home tidy.
Every morning, I walk the dog in the park.
Don't forget to water the plants every other day.
She has to take care of her younger brother.
After a long day, I like to relax with a good book.
It's important to get enough sleep for your health.
Last night, I had a strange dream.
